attributes.action: The Royal Family to state their stance on hunting, both in the UK and abroad.
attributes.background: Following the picture of Prince Harry with a rifle and a dead animal, can the Royal Family please state their stance on hunting, both in the UK and abroad.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions that ask for something that the UK Parliament or Government is responsible for. Neither Parliament nor the Government is responsible for the views of the Royal Family.
